name: The Cave Turning-Point
description:
The mud is getting deeper.  You are wondering, 'Would it be an idea to
leave, before I disappear?'.  To the south you notice a flat round stone
is blocking the way.  To the west you can see mud.

exits.description: You can see an opening behind the stone.

extra_descriptions.description:
The stone looks very uninteresting.  BUT as you are about to turn away, you
see a strip of light coming through a small hole.  Conclusion: The stone is
moveable.
